name: Goodreads - No Ads
description: Hides all add blocks on Goodreads
additional_info:
Release v1 - 2013-06-11 - Initial release
Release v2 - 2014-02-18 - Modified a few styles to hide what I can. Dynamic google ad ids are hard to target.
css:
@-moz-document domain("goodreads.com") {
#google_ads_div_Homepage_Top_ad_wrapper, 
#google_ads_div_Home_rec_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Book_page_top_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Group_Rec_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Recommendations_rec_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Explore_Books_Premium_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Listopia_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Explore_books_rec_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_300x250_ebooks_ad_container,
#google_ads_div_Quizzes_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Quote_page_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Story_Browse_ad_wrapper,
#google_ads_div_Browse_People_ad_wrapper,
#div-gpt-ad-1,
#ads,
.centerAd,
.selfServeAds,
#premiumAdTop,
.doubleStacked,
iframe { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; height: 0 !important; width: 0 !important; }
}
